EmailTemplate.name: Email Template on Case Closed
EmailTemplate.subject: Email to Case: Closed Service Request Auto Response
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Service Request {!Case.CaseNumber} has already been resolved and was closed on {!Case.ClosedDate}. We are sorry; this email thread is no longer being monitored.
We hope your inquiry has been resolved to your satisfaction. If you have additional questions, please give us a call at 916-297-9300 and we will be happy to assist you further.
If you have an new inquiry please create a new email thread and send to S3CCAPSCO@sutterhealth.org
Thank you,
The Accounts Payable Team
